title: Welcome to Flend ID
Scan the front of your National ID: Scan the front of your National ID
Scan the back of your National ID: Scan the back of your National ID
selfie: Capture the front view of your face.
right: Capture the right side of your face.
left: Capture the left side of your face.
detectFront: Place your ID on a level surface with it's front side facing upwards. Make sure the area is well lit and nothing obscures any details in your ID. Position your ID inside the frame that will appear on your screen.
detectBack: Place your ID on a level surface with it's front side facing upwards. Make sure the area is well lit and nothing obscures any details in your ID. Position your ID inside the frame that will appear on your screen.
liveness: Sit in a well lit area, and take a selfie with your webcam. Make sure to stand in front of your camera directly. Remove any obstructions that can block your face like hair or glasses.
takeFront: Place the front of your ID in the rectangle then capture it
takeBack: Place the back of your ID in the rectangle then capture it
idInstructions: Hold your ID so that its front side is facing the camera directly. Make sure the area is well lit and nothing obscures any details in your ID. Position your ID inside the frame that will appear on your screen.
confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this contract?
confirmRejectContract: Are you sure you want to reject this contract? This action is irreversible.
lookSelfie: Look directly into the camera to scan the selfie side.
lookRight: Look right to scan the right side.
lookLeft: Look left to scan the left side.
selfieInstructions: Sit in a well lit area, and take a selfie with your webcam. Make sure to stand in front of your camera directly. Remove any obstructions that can block your face like hair or glasses.
face match success: Your face matched your ID successfully

preparation: Make sure you sit comfortably in a well lit area.When you are ready, press start

face verification process: The following step is to confirm your ownership of the ID card confirmed previously.
face preparation: Sit in a well lit area, and take a selfie with the front camera of your phone. Make sure to hold your camera directly in front of your face. Remove any obstructions that can block your face like hair or glasses.

To ensure your credit card is valid, we: To ensure your credit card is valid, we will temporarily charge 1 LE to your account. This amount is only for verification purposes and will be refunded immediately or not deducted depending on your bank.Thank you for your understanding and trust.

By signing this consent form, I, the und: By signing this consent form, I, the undersigned, hereby give my full and informed consent to Flend SME Financing ("Flend") to:
1 - Extract Business Information: I auth: 1 - Extract Business Information: I authorize Flend to access and retrieve relevant business information from the partner platform(s) associated with my account.
2 - Inquiry Regarding iScore: I consent: 2 - Inquiry Regarding iScore: I consent to Flend inquiring about my personal and business iScore, including credit and financial data, for the purpose of assessing my eligibility for financing.
3 - Account Verification: I acknowledge: 3 - Account Verification: I acknowledge that Flend may deduct a nominal fee of 1 EGP from my account for the purpose of verifying my identity and account details.
I understand that this information will: I understand that this information will be used solely for the purpose of processing my financing application and for compliance with relevant legal and regulatory requirements. I also acknowledge that Flend will handle all personal and business information in accordance with applicable data privacy laws. By signing this form, I confirm that I have read and understood the above terms, and I freely and voluntarily consent to these actions.
